vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to support, sustain, stay, establish, strengthen, comfort
1a) (Qal) to support, sustain
1a1) to sustain, stay (of heart)
1a2) to support, uphold (of throne)
Aramaic equivalent: se.ad (סְעַד "to support" H5583)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 支持, 維繫, 留下
1a) (Qal) 維繫, 留下
1a1) 忍受, 忍耐(心)
1a2) 支持, 擁護(王位)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 支持, 维系, 留下
1a) (Qal) 维系, 留下
1a1) 忍受, 忍耐(心)
1a2) 支持, 拥护(王位)
